Posts.Content: Aug 20, 2010 06:40AM CharliMC wrote: I too am Highly allergic to taxatere and herceptrine.  I no longer have to take the taxatere but still have to take the herceptrine.... its keeping my cancer at bay right now.  I have to take a steroid and benedryl... but my cardio is good and I seem to be tolerating it pretty well.  I am looking into the L-cystein ...its supposed to keep your good cells healthy during chemo, I start it tomarrow so I will let ya know how it goes. cmc
Posts.Title: Highly allergic and facing TC chemo beau flash
